, the Labour leader, said Mr Andy Coulson 's departure was long overdue and questioned Mr David Cameron 's judgment for keeping him on the public payroll for so long. In a statement, Mr Andy Coulson said: Nothing is more important than the Government's task of getting this country back on its feet. Unfortunately, continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110 per cent needed in this role. "I stand by what I've said about those events but, when the spokesman needs a spokesman, it's time to move on. . Amitabh Srivastava , senior vice president over the company's Azure cloud unit, will be leaving, CEO Steve Ballmer said in an e-mail to employees Wednesday. Blade Network Technologies sells switches to improve blade server performance Windows Azure is in a great place, and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career. He has done stellar work for the company and I will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team, said Steve Ballmer . It's thought that Amitabh Srivastava 's exit is connected to Microsoft's announcement that company veteran Satya Nadella would replace Bob Muglia as head of Server and Tools. had tried to break open a golden sarcophagus, hoping to find treasures inside, and some skeletons were also damaged, Zahi Hawass said. A gallery displaying King Tut's treasures, on the other hand, was fully secure and had not been damaged. After the break-in, troops were deployed around the landmark rosestone building formally known as the Egyptian Museum of Antiquities, which has about 120,000 items on display or in storage. Mike Pence shut the door Thursday on seeking the presidency in 2012 but left unanswered whether his choice instead is the Indiana governor's office. I'm open to running for governor, Mike Pence said in an exclusive interview with The Indianapolis Star. "We're going to take the next several months to travel across the state and hear what Hoosiers have to say. We'll seriously consider it.

We've got very complicated government issues, he said, adding that "we move quickly, and we tend to be disruptive at scale."
